name: Brushed Wool Cashmere Short Sleeve Jacket
description: The Short Sleeve Jacket is made in Italy from a blend of brushed wool-cashmere, giving a luxurious texture to a modern sportswear style. The double-layered piece features the brand's signature elements such as a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, 3/4 sleeves, and slouchy side pockets. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
excerpt: Made in Italy from brushed wool-cashmere, this short sleeve jacket features a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, 3/4 sleeves, and slouchy side pockets. A leather Fear of God label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Wool Boucle Stand Collar Overcoat
description: The Stand Collar Relaxed Overcoat is tailored in Italy from a boucle textured wool-cotton blend to provide a natural, heavy texture. This is complemented by iridescent cupro lining. The minimalist design is clean, with no closures or hardware. The volume in the body allows comfortable layering. Details include chest welt, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from a wool-cotton boucle blend, this stand collar overcoat features a minimalist design with no closures, and includes chest welt, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label.

name: Wool Notch Lapel Jacket
description: The Notch Lapel Jacket is made in Italy from virgin wool and lined in an iridescent cupro. The modern design blends the traditional tailored jacket with a cropped casual style and can formally transition when paired with the 8th Trouser. Minimalist details include the complete absence of closures, side pockets, and leather Fear of God label.
excerpt: Made in Italy from virgin wool with an iridescent cupro lining, this notch lapel jacket features a modern, cropped style with no closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label.

name: Wool 8th Trouser
description: The 8th Trouser is tailored in Italy from 100% virgin wool for year-round wear. The classic, straight-leg fit perfectly pairs with the matching Notch Lapel Jacket. Functional details include side and back welt pockets. A Fear of God leather label is stitched on the back.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from 100% virgin wool, these straight-leg trousers feature side and back welt pockets, and pair perfectly with the Notch Lapel Jacket. A Fear of God leather label is stitched on the back.

name: Wool Gabardine 8th Trouser
description: The 8th Trouser is tailored in Italy from the traditionally bespoke wool gabardine for timeless style. The classic, straight-leg fit pairs well with the matching Relaxed Lapelless Blazer or Cropped Blazer. Details include a single pleat, side pockets, and back welt pockets. A Fear of God leather label is stitched on the back.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from wool gabardine, these straight-leg trousers feature a single pleat, side pockets, and back welt pockets. They pair well with the Relaxed Lapelless Blazer or Cropped Blazer. A Fear of God leather label is stitched on the back.

name: Wool Gabardine Long Lapelless Suit Jacket
description: The Long Lapelless Suit Jacket is tailored in Italy from wool gabardine to provide traditional formality in a modern, relaxed silhouette. The single-breasted style is accented by an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from wool gabardine, this single-breasted suit jacket features an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label.

name: Wool Gabardine Cropped Lapelless Blazer
description: The Cropped Relaxed Lapelless Blazer is tailored in Italy from wool gabardine into a modern cropped, boxy silhouette. The double-breasted style is accented by an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from wool gabardine, this cropped, boxy blazer features a double-breasted style with an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label.

name: Wool Gabardine Classic Overcoat
description: The Double Breasted Overcoat is tailored in Italy from wool gabardine for timeless bespoke style, accented by iridescent cupro lining. The double-breasted design is more traditional than the relaxed overcoat style. Side pockets and horn button closures offer functionality. A leather Fear of God label is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from wool gabardine, this double-breasted overcoat features iridescent cupro lining, side pockets, horn button closures, and a leather Fear of God label.

name: Wool Gabardine Cropped Blazer
description: The Cropped Relaxed Blazer is tailored in Italy from wool gabardine into a modern cropped, boxy silhouette. The double-breasted style is accented by an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from wool gabardine, this cropped blazer features a double-breasted style with an iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label.

name: Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket
description: The Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket is crafted in Italy from teddy textured shearling to create the most luxurious outerwear proposition. The minimalist design is clean, without any closures or hardware. Volume in the body and sleeves allows layering, and side pockets offer functionality.
excerpt: Crafted in Italy from teddy textured shearling, this shawl collar jacket features a minimalist design with no closures or hardware, allowing for layering and functionality with side pockets.

name: Vented Denim Shirt
description: The Vented Denim Shirt is made in Japan from a vintage black Japanese denim. The fit is oversized with dropped shoulders, shirt collar, back vent, horn button closure, and barrel cuffs. The Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim, this oversized shirt features dropped shoulders, a shirt collar, back vent, horn button closure, and barrel cuffs. The Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Classic 5 Pocket
description: The Classic 5 Pocket Jean is made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim and designed in a timeless straight-leg fit. The five-pocket style is detailed with antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim, these straight-leg jeans feature five pockets, antique brass hardware, a raw ankle hem, and a Fear of God leather label stitched on the center front.

name: Denim Duster
description: The Denim Duster is made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Additional details include horn button closures and side pockets. A leather Fear of God is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim, this lapelless, double-breasted duster features voluminous body for layering, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: 80's 5 Pocket
description: The 80's 5 Pocket Jean is made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim and designed in a relaxed leg with a slight taper. The five-pocket style is detailed with antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage black Japanese denim, these relaxed jeans with a slight taper feature five pockets, antique brass hardware, a raw ankle hem, and a Fear of God leather label stitched on center front.

name: Military Wool Lapelless Coat
description: The Lapelless Overcoat is tailored in Italy from a sturdy military wool-cotton blend to provide a strong structure that is softened by iridescent cupro lining. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Details include horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from a sturdy military wool-cotton blend, this lapelless, double-breasted overcoat features a voluminous body, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: Milano Short Sleeve Tee
description: The Short Sleeve Tee is made in Italy from a Milano viscose jersey that combines stretch comfort with formal polish. The crewneck piece features the brand's signature elements, a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
excerpt: Made in Italy from Milano viscose jersey, this crewneck tee combines stretch comfort with formal polish. It features a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and a Fear of God leather label stitched at the back collar.

name: Melton Wool Lapelless Coat
description: The Lapelless Overcoat is tailored in Italy from an classic Melton wool with a soft hand feel, complemented by iridescent cupro lining. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Additional details include horn button closures and side pockets. A leather Fear of God is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from classic Melton wool with a soft hand feel, this lapelless, double-breasted overcoat features voluminous body for layering, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: Double Wool Cashmere Hooded Bomber
description: The Hooded Bomber is made in Italy from wool-cashmere to contribute depth and softness. The signature Fear of God fit is evident in the relaxed silhouette with dropped shoulders. Additional details include a front antique brass zipper, double-layered hood, side pockets, wool rib-knit cuffs, and waist hem. A leather Fear of God label is stitched on the hood.
excerpt: Made in Italy from wool-cashmere, this hooded bomber features a relaxed silhouette with dropped shoulders, a front antique brass zipper, double-layered hood, side pockets, wool rib-knit cuffs, and waist hem. A leather Fear of God label is stitched on the hood.

name: Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket
description: The Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket is a luxurious outerwear piece featuring a shawl collar and crafted from plush sherpa fabric. It provides ultimate warmth and comfort with its relaxed fit and premium construction.
excerpt: This Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket is made from plush sherpa fabric for ultimate warmth and comfort. It features a shawl collar, relaxed fit, and premium construction.

name: Classic 5 Pocket
description: The Classic 5 Pocket Jean is made in Japan from vintage light indigo Japanese denim and designed in a timeless straight-leg fit. The five-pocket style is detailed with antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage light indigo Japanese denim, this timeless straight-leg jean features antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem, with a Fear of God leather label stitched on center front.

name: 80's 5 Pocket
description: The 80's 5 Pocket Jean is made in Japan from vintage medium indigo Japanese denim and designed in a relaxed leg with a slight taper. The five-pocket style is detailed with antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage medium indigo Japanese denim, this relaxed leg jean features a slight taper, antique brass hardware, and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.

name: Denim Duster
description: The Denim Duster is made in Japan from vintaged medium indigo Japanese denim. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Additional details include horn button closures and side pockets. A leather Fear of God is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintaged medium indigo Japanese denim, this lapelless, double-breasted duster features a voluminous body for layering, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: Merino Boucle Polo Hoodie
description: The Polo Hoodie is knitted in Italy from a heavy merino wool blend with a boucle texture. The designed volume in the body and sleeves creates a round silhouette. The polo placket, hood, rib-knit cuffs, and waist hem frame the piece. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
excerpt: Knitted in Italy from a heavy merino wool blend with a boucle texture, this Polo Hoodie features a round silhouette with a polo placket, hood, rib-knit cuffs, and waist hem. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Alpaca Herringbone Lapelless Coat
description: The Lapelless Overcoat is tailored in Italy from a blend of soft baby alpaca wool in a brushed herringbone texture, accented by iridescent cupro lining. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Details include horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from a blend of soft baby alpaca wool in a brushed herringbone texture, this lapelless, double-breasted overcoat features voluminous body for layering, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: Merino Full Zip Sweater
description: Made in Italy, the Full Zip Sweater is knitted from a heavy merino wool, and detailed with a jacquard "F" on each sleeve. The design features a full front zip with volume in the body and sleeves for pronounced drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
excerpt: Made in Italy from heavy merino wool, this Full Zip Sweater features a jacquard "F" on each sleeve, a full front zip, and pronounced drape with volume in the body and sleeves. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Classic 5 Pocket
description: The Classic 5 Pocket Jean is made in Japan from vintage washed grey Japanese denim and designed in a timeless straight-leg fit. The five-pocket style is detailed with antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem. The Fear of God leather label is stitched on center front.
excerpt: Made in Japan from vintage washed grey Japanese denim, this timeless straight-leg jean features antique brass hardware and a raw ankle hem, with a Fear of God leather label stitched on center front.

name: Pique Knit Lapelless Blazer
description: The Relaxed Lapelless Blazer is tailored in Italy from a luxurious pique knit to provide compelling texture and soft casual style. The single-breasted style is accented by a partial iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a Leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from a luxurious pique knit, this Relaxed Lapelless Blazer features compelling texture and a soft casual style, with a partial iridescent cupro lining, horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label stitched on the sleeve.

name: Military Wool Wide Leg Pants
description: The Single Pleat Wide Leg Pant is tailored in Italy from a heavy wool-cotton blend to provide a military-inspired structure to a voluminous silhouette. Additional features include an encased elastic waistband, elongated drawstring, side pockets, and leather Fear of God label.
excerpt: Tailored in Italy from a heavy wool-cotton blend, these Single Pleat Wide Leg Pants feature a military-inspired structure with an encased elastic waistband, elongated drawstring, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label.

name: Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket
description: The Sherpa Shawl Collar Jacket is crafted in Italy from shearling with a plush shawl collar and vintage leather style. The minimalist design is clean, without any closures or hardware. Volume in the body and sleeves allows layering, and side pockets offer functionality.
excerpt: Crafted in Italy from shearling, this jacket features a plush shawl collar and a vintage leather style with a clean, closure-free design. The voluminous body and sleeves enable layering, and it includes functional side pockets.

name: Shearling Hooded Bomber
description: The Hooded Bomber is crafted in Italy from long-haired shearling to create a luxuriously refined sportswear icon. Designed volume in the body and sleeves shapes a round silhouette. This hooded, full-zip piece features wool rib-knit cuffs and waist hem with side pockets.
excerpt: This hooded bomber jacket, made from long-haired shearling, combines a refined sportswear look with a voluminous, round silhouette. It features wool rib-knit cuffs and waist hem, and includes side pockets for functionality.

name: Weighted Twill Relaxed Blazer
description: The Relaxed Blazer is tailored in Italy from Fear of God's signature weighted wool-cotton twill to provide a sartorial structure. The double-breasted style is voluminous and elongated, which allows the piece to function as outerwear with ample room for layering. Additional details include a cupro lining, side pockets, horn button closures, and a Fear of God leather label.
excerpt: Tailored from weighted wool-cotton twill, this relaxed blazer offers sartorial structure with a voluminous, elongated double-breasted style. Features include a cupro lining, side pockets, horn button closures, and a Fear of God leather label.

name: Weighted Twill Wide Leg Cargo Pants
description: The Cargo Pant is crafted in Italy from Fear of God's signature weighted wool-cotton twill. The military-inspired design balances a substantially relaxed leg with a strong structure. Additional details include cargo pockets, side pockets, an encased elastic waistband with a drawstring, and metal snaps at the ankle for adjustability. A Fear of God leather label is stitched on the center front.
excerpt: Crafted from weighted wool-cotton twill, these cargo pants feature a military-inspired design with a relaxed leg and strong structure. Includes cargo pockets, side pockets, an encased elastic waistband with drawstring, and adjustable metal snaps at the ankle.

name: Boiled Wool Relaxed Shorts
description: The Relaxed Short is sewn in Italy from boiled virgin wool to provide a natural texture and structure to a relaxed short. Details include an encased elastic waistband, elongated drawstring, side pockets, and Fear of God leather label.
excerpt: Made from boiled virgin wool, these relaxed shorts feature a natural texture with an encased elastic waistband, elongated drawstring, and side pockets. A Fear of God leather label adds a finishing touch.

name: Alpaca Herringbone Lapelless Coat
description: The Lapelless Overcoat is tailored in Italy from a blend of soft baby alpaca wool in a brushed herringbone texture, accented by iridescent cupro lining. The lapelless, double-breasted style is voluminous in the body to provide comfortable layering. Details include horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: This lapelless overcoat, made from a soft baby alpaca wool blend with a brushed herringbone texture, features a voluminous double-breasted style for comfortable layering. Includes horn button closures, side pockets, and a leather Fear of God label on the sleeve.

name: Brushed Wool Cashmere Lapelless Blazer
description: The Relaxed Lapelless Blazer is tailored in Italy from a brushed wool-cashmere to provide ultimate softness to an unstructured style. The relaxed fit allows comfortable layering and drape. Horn button closures, and side pockets offer functionality. A leather Fear of God label is stitched on the sleeve.
excerpt: Tailored from brushed wool-cashmere, this relaxed lapelless blazer offers exceptional softness and an unstructured style. The relaxed fit allows for comfortable layering, with horn button closures and side pockets for added functionality.
